backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with access control mixin, user/session types, server/channel/message structures, and comparison helpers.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a no-op migration module returning an empty new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping frontend files to authentication and session-related requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files for documentation or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell loading the main React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component wiring authentication, profile setup flow, theming, navigation, and responsive shell rendering.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: Implements authentication context with session restore, backend session validation, and login/register placeholders.
frontend/src/auth/sessionStorage.ts: Utility for persisting, loading, validating, and clearing session data in localStorage.
frontend/src/auth/useAuth.ts: Convenience hook exposing the authentication context.
Layout wrapper for auth-related pages with centered card design and logo.
frontend/src/components/channels/Categor: Renders a collapsible category showing its text and voice channels and includes a dialog for creating new channels.
frontend/src/components/channels/CreateC: Provides a dialog form to create a new channel category on a server with backend validation and guarded submission.
Dialog for creating text or voice channels within a category, handling type selection and backend‑guarded submission.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Message input box for sending text messages to the selected channel with backend state handling and send button controls.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatView.ts: Displays messages for the selected text channel with auto‑scrolling and includes the message composer at the bottom.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageItem: Renders a single chat message with avatar, author info, timestamp, role‑colored name, and selectable member profile.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Discov: Shows discoverable community servers with search filtering and allows users to join a server.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Server: Card component displaying a server’s basic info, member count, and a button to join the server.
frontend/src/components/dms/DMHomeView.t: Switches between friends view and a placeholder DM home screen based on navigation state.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendRo: Renders a friend's avatar, name, status, and action buttons using fetched profile data.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsH: Displays friend lists, pending requests, and an add‑friend form using query hooks and tabs.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSh: Desktop layout that shows server rail, sidebar, main content, and member list based on navigation state.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainConte: Chooses which main view to render—DMs, discovery, chat, voice, stage, or settings—according to navigation state.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileShe: Mobile layout using sliding sheets for servers, channels, and members, with main content centered.
frontend/src/components/layout/Responsiv: Selects mobile or desktop shell depending on window width.
frontend/src/components/members/MemberLi: Shows a scrollable list of server members with avatars, colors, and click handling.
frontend/src/components/nav/ChannelSideb: Sidebar showing DM tabs in home view or server categories and settings in server view.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTopBar: Top bar for mobile that provides navigation buttons and shows current view title.
frontend/src/components/nav/ServerRail.t: Displays a vertical server navigation bar with home, server list, and create-server controls, using ordering and navigation state.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal dialog for initial profile setup allowing the user to enter a display name and create their profile.
frontend/src/components/profile/RoleAssi: Dialog for assigning or removing roles from a user, handling pending mutations and displaying available roles.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserProf: Overlay showing a user's profile, roles, badges, and actions, with support for opening role management.
frontend/src/components/servers/CreateSe: Modal dialog for creating a new server with name and description fields, respecting backend action restrictions.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerIc: Renders a server's icon image or a fallback initial if no custom icon exists.
frontend/src/components/settings/ServerS: Dialog component for creating text or voice channels within a server, handling category selection, form state, and mutation calls.
Dialog for moving a channel to another category, filtering available categories and triggering a move callback.
Panel for selecting a server member and managing their assigned roles, including viewing current roles and opening a role assignment dialog.
Page that fetches, formats, sorts, and displays audit log entries for a server with loading and error states.
Page for viewing and managing server categories and channels, including creation dialogs, move dialogs, and ordered channel/category rendering.
Page for editing basic server settings such as description, icon, banner, and community mode, with save mutation handling.
UI panel to select a server member and view or manage their assigned roles, including opening a role assignment dialog.
Displays roles in a server and provides UI to create new roles and assign them to members via the RoleMemberAssignmentPanel.
Container for server settings with a sidebar of pages and dynamic rendering of the selected settings page.
frontend/src/components/settings/UserSet: Allows users to change theme settings and adjust text scale using radio buttons and a slider.
Loads and edits the user's profile, username, and account info with save actions for profile and username changes.
Container for user settings with navigation between profile and appearance pages and a logout option.
frontend/src/components/system/BackendCo: Empty placeholder component file for backend connection status banner.
Static stage channel view showing example speakers, audience members, and a raise hand button.
Voice channel interface enabling join/leave actions, mute/deafen toggles, and displaying live participant lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActionGuard: Determines whether backend actions should be disabled based on backend connection state.
Establishes backend readiness by combining actor initialization with a health check and exposes connection status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity initialization via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Returns whether the viewport width is below a specified breakpoint.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogout.ts: Performs logout through the auth provider and clears all React Query cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides typed React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, server, and messaging data via the backend actor with friendly error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Safely initializes an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with retry support and non-fatal access control setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, light/dark modes, and base UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Implements sign-in and sign-up forms with validation, error handling, and integration with the auth system.
frontend/src/state/navigation.ts: Provides a React context managing navigation state such as current view, selected server/channel, UI panes, and category expansion.
frontend/src/state/notifications.ts: Manages per-server and per-channel notification overrides using localStorage with helpers for muting checks.
frontend/src/state/settings.ts: Implements a React context for user settings including theme, accent color, text scale, notifications, and keybinds persisted in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/hideElementByXPath.ts: Removes a specific button via XPath and provides a MutationObserver helper to keep it removed.
frontend/src/utils/roleColor.ts: Sanitizes role color hex values and computes contrast and luminance for readable text on colored backgrounds.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL params, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted parameters for routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to authentication and session handling.
